sentences.english: Since then, Nanxun has forged an unbreakable bond with each world exposition.
sentences.chinese: 百年世博一絲牽，南潯與世博會結下了不解之緣。

sentences.english: The Zhang families and the leaders from Nan Xun government are in the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 張家後人及南潯區有關部門負責人出席開館儀式。
